DVSClasses Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
  • DVSBadArgumentsException (A method was called with inappropriate arguments for the current configuration of the DVS board For example, specifying buffers for fields for video output, when the DVS board is configured for frames)
  • DVSCannotOpenHandleException (Attempt to open handle to DVS board by calling sv_open() failed This exception is thrown during the instantiation of a new DVSCard object when the attempt to obtain a handle for the board from the DVS driver API fails)
  • DVSCard (Object representing access to a DVS video board)
  • DVSCardAlreadyUsedException (Attempt to instantiate a DVSCard object when one already exists for that card number This exception is thrown during the instantiation of a new DVSCard object)
  • DVSDriverException (Error code returned from call to DVS driver API functions This exception is generated by routines in this class library when a function in the DVS driver API returns an error code (return value is not SV_OK) <)
  • DVSException (Base class for exceptions)
  • DVSFIFOEmptyException (Input FIFO empty - unable to read This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to read from an video input FIFO when it is empty)
  • DVSFIFOInUseException (FIFO already in use - unable to read This exception is thrown when attempting to read or write a FIFO that is already being used)
  • DVSFIFONotStartedException (Attempt to use a FIFO video input or output function without first starting the FIFO)
  • DVSHandle (Object providing access to a DVS driver handle for a DVS video board)
  • DVSInternalErrorException (A general fault occurred within the DVSClasses class library This exception is thrown by a variety of methods when these is some kind of internal fault)
  • DVSNullHandleException (DVSHandle object used has become invalid This exception is thrown when a DVSHandle object is used to obtain a handle when the DVSCard object from which this has been obtained has been deleted)
  • DVSTC (Object representing timecode)
Matt Hammond BBC R&D. Class library documentation created using doxygen documentation generator.
